short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make event planning easier by managing to-do checklists for many aspects of an event.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Side Panel extension works with the Ticketing.events Platform.

It enables you and your team to organize your event planning by creating to-do checklists for many aspects of an event.

With this extension, you can use the context of a web page you are viewing to create tasks and add notes.

You can search for attendees, and also scan their QR Code tickets.

You can receive notifications for new and upcoming tasks, and for milestones that are reached.
